body:
o boi the time has come, everything you love you have to let it go.

idk if this is an ama or what (i hope not) so please say something (but dont ask for a goddamn opinion)

had lots of fun discussing, joking around and playing tournament here with my beaner pals but its sad to see it shutdown (even tho i dont play anymore)

so idk ask or say things, also im sad to say I failed you guys, I didn’t got 850 on the PSU (https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/746e562cd )
